architecture.title: How It Works
architecture.description: Four hierarchical layers working in harmony to deliver reliable, real-time air quality insights
architecture.layer1Description: Tynys IoT Device. Localized acquisition, signal filtering, and onboard processing for accurate environmental readings.
architecture.layer2Description: MQTT over Wi-Fi. Buffer-based fallback ensures zero data loss during connectivity drops, maintaining data integrity.
architecture.layer3Description: Structured SQL Database & Web Dashboard. Scalable storage with secure multi-user access for seamless collaboration.
architecture.layer4Description: Pollution classification using XGBoost & Random Forest. Anomaly detection for smarter transit decisions and predictive insights.
